description:
Qashio is a comprehensive spend management platform for businesses to manage expenses, payments with integrated corporate cards and accounts payable automation.

Gulf Capital Fintech of the Year 2022
Entrepreneur E-Payment Solution of the Year 2023

Qashio integrates real-time tracking for every business expense, automates accounting and provides real-time reporting to give better visibility and true control over all spend so that you can make informed cash flow decisions. With Qashio you can build strategic budgets and automate expense reporting.
description_enriched: Qashio is an award-winning expense management solution, corporate cards, finance, and tax automation for MENA businesses.
description_metadata_raw: Award-winning expense management solution, corporate cards, finance and tax automation for MENA businesses.
categories_and_keywords: business and consumer services > business services (in united arab emirates)

If your company is still filing expense reports on Excel, youâ€™re doing it wrong..
..

In my latest Finance Insider Podcast, I sat with Armin Moradi (CEO and co-Founder of Qashio) to unpack why expense management is broken and how smarter spend controls and automation can flip the script.

We got into:
 1) Why Excel expense reports and reimbursements are killing finance teams
 2) How companies can win back control over every subscription payments
 3) How controls like vendor-locks protect against card fraud (works like magic, i've personally tested!)

Find out in this episode how to move from manual reports and reimbursementsâ€¦to automated controls that actually protect the business!

Big thanks to Armin for joining me on this episode and sharing such sharp insights. Wishing him and the team at Qashio all the best as they continue building one of the most exciting fintech stories in the region. ğŸš€

Most small business owners find themselves spending over AED 100K per month on expenses. Interestingly, many end up squandering significant amounts on unused travel benefits due to inefficient utilization of their corporate cards and points.

Book a demo to replicate what the client below did: https://lnkd.in/dMX6Qguk 

One of our Qashio clients managed to leverage their AED 100K/month expenditure into an impressive 1M points within a year's time. The result? Luxurious business-class flights and stays at five-star hotels became a reality.

It's essential to recognize that these points aren't just an added bonus; they represent pre-paid travel opportunities that can either be utilized or foregone.

So, the critical question arises: Are your business expenses merely generating more receipts, or are they strategically acquiring frequent flier miles for your benefit

Is Sherlock Holmes on your finance team? You might need him... or you could just switch to Qashio.

Most banks are already charging high fees on international card payments, even if theyâ€™re settled in AED.

In 2025, many have increased these fees by up to 50%, and more are following.

You probably didnâ€™t notice because these fees are added days after the transaction, without any notification.

Only a handful of banks clearly show them on monthly statements. And by the time you find out, itâ€™s too late.

The last two weeks have been a humbling experience for us at Qashio! We got the opportunity to show the world what an amazing and modern solution Qashio for Travel is at our launch event at the Royal Atlantis Spa & Resort and to establish our presence at Arabian Travel Market with one of the most visited stands of the whole exhibition.

When we started the project in 2022 together with Visa we had a vision to build UAE's first Business Loyalty program and Travel solution for Travel companies as the industry even though massive was severely underserved. We spent years doing research and development, looking at international standards while localizing the solution to serve the needs of the local players in UAE and KSA.  

The result: 
- Fast growing Loyalty Program with soon more than 10 top tier Airline & Hotel Partners
- Multicurrency cards (AED, SAR, USD, EUR, GBP) for the travel industry to save money on international transfers
- High Cashbacks, Rebates and Ultralow FX fee's to support the growing need for cashflow

It's been an honor to work alongside every single Qashio team member involved in taking the vision to reality and to top it of, the greatest honor and validation of all was for the greatest modern visionary HH Sheikh Mohammed Bin Rashid Al Maktoum to stop by our stand. 

We look forward to serve and be part of the growth of the Travel Industry in UAE and GCC

Feeling the frustration of dealing with bank transfers for new vendor payments? The time-consuming steps and delays can be a major hindrance to business productivity, impacting both Time and Money.

Recently, our team encountered a scenario where a simple bill payment of less than AED 5000 turned into an 8.5-hour ordeal involving a staggering 14 steps. This lengthy process resulted in a delay of 5 days for the service we required.

Qashio as a solution and a payment link would streamline this task to under a minute. By automating financial data entry, reconciliation, and integrating seamlessly with our Oracle NetSuite ERP system, the efficiency gains are significant. Not only would payments be expedited, but also rewards like Qashio points convertible to Emirates Skywards Miles would be earned.

Instead of spending 505 minutes navigating through multiple steps, including waiting for approvals, creating payments, and manual data entries, consider the impact on productivity and costs. The time wasted on these manual processes equates to more than a full day's salary.

By advocating for card payments with your vendors, you can minimize such inefficiencies and avoid absorbing unnecessary costs for processes that hinder your operations. Streamlining payment methods can save valuable time and resources, benefiting both your team and the business's bottom line. 

Here are the 14 steps and time it took to get the service delayed 5 days 
                                                                                            
1, Review the invoice                                                        - 5 min
2, Login to the banking portal and wait for the OTP   - 10 min
3, Wait for the banking page to load                              - 2 min
4, Upload the beneficiary                                                 - 7 min
5, Wait for the Authorizer to approve the beneficiary - 80 min
6, Authorizer to login and approve the beneficiary     - 15 min
7, COOLDOWN Period (for a adhoc transaction)        - 240 min
8, Create the payment (+ repeat step 1 - 3)                 - 24 min
9, Wait for Authorizer to release payment                     - 80 min
10, Authorizer to login, review and release payment   - 20 min
11, Create Vendor, Upload TRN in ERP system             - 20 min
12, Attach / Log TRN Number to claim VAT in ERP       - 4 min
13, Create Journal Voucher / Entry in ERP                      - 12 min
14, Double Check that manual entries are correct.      - 6 min                            

Work smarter with Qashio not harder with outdated processes...

Why I choose Deliveroo over talabat and why I shop on Amazon instead of noon.... for one simple reason - to EARN more miles, rewards, and points!

Whether you use credit cards for earning Marriott International Points, Emirates Skywards miles, or other benefits hinges on the "interchange" or in other words the commission provided to the card provider by the payment gateway that the merchants use. This commission is determined by the Merchant Category Code (MCC), which is a percentage of the transaction value determined by the category the merchant belongs to.

For instance, Deliveroo is rightfully categorized as a restaurant, while Talabat is classified as a grocery company despite primarily focusing on aggregating restaurant deliveries and claiming they are a technology company on their Linkedin page. Similarly, Noon, markets itself as an E-commerce or Retail entity (according to their Linkedin page in UAE & KSA) while their MCC carries a grocery status. These companies collaborate with payment gateways to lower fees, resulting in reduced rewards for their customers like miles and cashbacks on credit cards used.

This practice extends beyond just these examples. To optimize spending and maximize rewards, it's crucial to choose vendors wisely.

Both Noon & Talabat are otherwise great services and great companies with fantastic individuals leading the organizations employing some of the best talent in the country. I would have used them much more frequently if I would have earned the same rewards on my credit cards as I do when using Deliveroo and Amazon since the cost to me remains the same. 

At Qashio, our Customer Success Management team proactively assists clients in selecting the right vendors to maximize cashbacks, miles, and other rewards without incurring additional costs. We work in alignment with our clients objectives to enhance payment efficiency, minimize expenses and risks, and ensure the highest returns on all expenditures through a unified platform. 

Learn more and book a demo https://lnkd.in/dMX6Qguk
